root: ^Come get your hotdogs, fresh hotdogs here!
^you look hungry, why dont you try a hotdog?

c-1: ^well to bad, because they ain't free.

lastLine: ^Anything else I can help you with?

c-0: ^I think I have seen him around here, but I can't quite remember...
^Now you're talking my language, you must really want to find him.
^Last time I saw him, he entered the casino in the north.
^But he hasn't left that building since.
^So if I were you, I would hurry up there. HA ha haaa...
^Fresh hot dogs! Come get your hot dogs!
